name: Blue OG
description: Blue OG from G13 Labs is a flavorful hybrid following the lineage of Blueberry F3, Blue Moonshine, and OG Kush. These dark, cone-shaped buds characteristic of OG genes emanate notes of berry and citrus, and leave its consumer feeling euphoric and relaxed. Though its effects are cerebrally targeted, Blue OG is known to also tackle pain, relax muscles, and relieve nausea. Growers can expect an eight week flowering period with ideal conditions outdoors.Â
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Euphoric, Uplifted, Hungry, Muscle Spasms, Stress, Pain, Fatigue, Headaches, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Headache, Anxious
